name: Moonstone Renewer
tooltip:
Moonstone Renewer

Cost: 2700


UNIQUE Passive - Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat, heal the nearby ally with the most missing health for 30 − 60 (based on target's level) (2 second cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases this heal by 37.5%, stacking up to 4 times for maximum of 150%.

UNIQUE Passive - Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
